QuestData.Title: Host Howell
QuestData.Description: Lieutenant Howell said you might be showing up.$b$bIt's such an honor to meet you in person. The lieutenant is at the inn, I'll escort you over there.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Lieutenant Howell at Stormshield in Ashran.
QuestData.RewardText: Commander $n, I'm so glad you could make it. It's a true honor, sir.
